item.title: PyPad 1.7.4-prerelease
item.description: - Soft modern rounded UI overhaul across core chrome (tabs, toolbars, menus, docks, status bar, scrollbars) - Shared token-based theming now powers main UI, dialogs, Quick Open, AI Chat, and more utility panels - Quick Open / Go to Anything expanded with symbols, workspace symbols, background indexing/cache, grouping, and live refresh - AI chat productivity upgrades: one-click apply actions, diff preview flow, whole-file replace actions, and safer insert-offer parsing - Dialog theming expanded across Settings, Tutorial, Autosave, Workspace dialogs, AI edit preview, Debug Logs, and updater dialogs - Added visual UI regression tooling (screenshot smoke tests, HTML manifest, baseline compare/update mode, CI gate) - Split UI CI checks into fast, runtime-smoke, and visual-smoke workflows for faster feedback - Fixed tab-close hover-mode theming/runtime regressions discovered by new smoke tests - Detailed changelog: CHANGELOG.md
